Hero.name: Sahand Mohammed
Hero.role: A Software Engineer specializing in building exceptional web and mobile application experiences.

Sections.subtitle: Thoughts, tutorials, and insights on software development, design, and emerging technologies.

CloudServices.title: Cloud & <gradient>DevOps</gradient>
CloudServices.subtitle: Beyond coding, I provide end-to-end infrastructure solutions to ensure your applications run smoothly, securely, and efficiently.

infrastructure.title: Cloud Infrastructure Setup
infrastructure.description: Architecting and provisioning secure, scalable cloud environments on AWS, Google Cloud, or DigitalOcean tailored to your application needs.

server.title: Server Administration
server.description: Comprehensive management of Linux servers, including configuration, optimization, and routine maintenance to ensure peak performance.

environment.title: Environment Management
environment.description: Setting up isolated development, staging, and production environments to streamline the software development lifecycle.

security.title: Security & Compliance
security.description: Implementing robust security protocols, firewalls, and access controls to protect your infrastructure and data.

Education.title: Academic <gradient>Qualification</gradient>
Education.subtitle: My educational background that laid the foundation for my engineering journey.
Education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering (BSE)
Education.description: Completed a comprehensive engineering curriculum focusing on software architecture, system design, algorithms, and application development lifecycles. Gained hands-on experience in full-stack development and agile methodologies.

Projects.title: Featured <gradient>Projects</gradient>
Projects.subtitle: A selection of projects that demonstrate my expertise in web and mobile development.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: A full-featured e-commerce web application built with Next.js and NestJS, featuring real-time inventory and secure payments.

taskApp.title: Task Management App
taskApp.description: A collaborative task management tool for teams, built with Flutter and Firebase for real-time updates across devices.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Portal
healthcare.description: Secure patient portal for accessing medical records and scheduling appointments, compliant with healthcare standards.

Skills.title: Technical <gradient>Expertise</gradient>
Skills.subtitle: A versatile technology stack that enables me to build end-to-end solutions.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Building responsive, interactive, and performant user interfaces.

backend.title: Backend Engineering
backend.description: Designing scalable architectures and robust server-side logic.

devops.title: DevOps & Tools
devops.description: Streamlining deployment pipelines and ensuring system reliability.
